name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James OLIVER, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
NIX, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James OLIVER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
NIX, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joel Harvey Slomsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
378 A.2d 858
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James OLIVER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 10, 1977.
Decided Oct. 7, 1977.
Joel Harvey Slomsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
